statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); base_dir=$(basename "$current_dir"); git_info=""; if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git_status=""; if ! git diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || ! git diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null || [ -n "$(git ls-files --others --exclude-standard 2>/dev/null)" ]; then git_status="*"; fi; git_info=" $branch$git_status"; fi; fi; printf "\033[2m%s%s\033[0m" "$base_dir" "$git_info"
